author: @tarikcanli3647
text: If see this error : AttributeError: 'AxesSubplot' object has no attribute 'get_xtickables' plt.setp(ax1.get_xticklabels(), visible=False) plt.setp(ax2.get_xticklabels(), visible=False) these lines will fix it and for more https://matplotlib.org/3.1.0/_modules/matplotlib/axes/_subplots.html
